subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: Some of the biggest stars in men’s tennis come to Halle for a week of quiet recuperation after the French Open as well as fast-paced preparation for Wimbledon at the Gerry Weber Open.
snippet: Some of the biggest stars in men’s tennis come to Halle for a week of quiet recuperation after the French Open as well as fast-paced preparation for Wimbledon at the Gerry Weber Open.
